visual.description: You learn best through visual aids like charts, diagrams, written instructions, and seeing information organized spatially.

auditory.description: You prefer learning through listening, verbal explanations, discussions, and processing information through sound.

kinesthetic.description: You learn most effectively through hands-on experience, physical practice, movement, and tactile exploration.

social.description: You thrive in collaborative learning environments, group discussions, and learning through interaction with others.

learningProfile.description: You have a strong visual learning preference with significant kinesthetic tendencies. This combination suggests you learn best when multiple approaches are used together.

goals.title: Improve study efficiency
goals.description: Use visual learning techniques to increase retention
